text: Zoran Gopčević (Serbian Cyrillic: Зоран Гопчевић; 29 January 1955 – 30 September 2000) was a water polo player. As a member of Yugoslavia's water polo team he won a silver medal at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==See also== * List of Olympic medalists in water polo ==References== * Vaterpolo Klub Primorac Kotor: http://primorac.me/klub/legende.html ==External links== * Category:1952 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Yugoslav male water polo players Category:Olympic medalists in water polo Category:Olympic silver medalists for Yugoslavia Category:Olympic water polo players of Yugoslavia Category:Water polo players at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics
title: Zoran Gopčević
